name: Beatboy vs The Synths
description:
Play as BeatBoy in his music powered Synthcraft, survive as long as possible against the hordes of enemies by switching tracks to power your 3 distinct weapons.

Fly with WASD, aim with the mouse, LMB and RMB to switch songs.

Tips:

  • The laser can hit many targets but doesn't do much damage, the heatseeker hits hard but is for single-targets, the ion bullet is a nice inbetween
  • The drum fills in the song will cause a brief rapid fire effect, make sure to have your targets lined up for these
  • The heatseeker is useful for taking care of pesky turrets that spawned offscreen. It's a feature!

Made for the December #1GAM. Missed it by a few days but c'mon, it's Christmas.
